newsArray.title: Women's World Cup: Smriti Mandhana's sensational 2025 continues, breaks multiple records with century against New Zealand
creator: Chankesh Rao
newsArray.description: Smriti Mandhana's dream run in 2025 continues as the Indian opener smashes a record-breaking century against New Zealand in the Women's World Cup. With this knock, Mandhana breaks multiple world records, further cementing her status as one of the greatest batters in women's cricket history.

newsArray.title: England Win Three-Match T20I Series Against New Zealand 1-0; Harry Brook and Co Clinch Series Victory As Rain Plays Spoilsport in 3rd T20I 2025
keywords: england national cricket team vs new zealand national cricket team
new zealand national cricket team vs england national cricket team
creator: IANS
newsArray.description: In the third T20I, England won the toss and opted to field first. While the hosts looked to level the series 1-1, the visitors looked to add another ‘W’ against their name for the series to end in their favour. But rain interrupted wiping out any chance of playing. As a result, England won the series 1-0 courtesy of their victory in the second T20I.

newsArray.title: ਇਸ ਕ੍ਰਿਕਟਰ ਨੂੰ ਹੋਇਆ ਸਟੇਜ 4 ਕੈਂਸਰ, ਜਲਦੀ ਸਿਹਤਯਾਬੀ ਲਈ ਹਰ ਫੈਨ ਕਰ ਰਿਹਾ ਦੁਆ...
newsArray.description: ਇੰਗਲੈਂਡ ਅਤੇ ਕੈਂਟ ਦੀ ਸਾਬਕਾ ਮਹਿਲਾ ਕ੍ਰਿਕਟਰ ਸੂਜ਼ੀ ਵਿਲਸਨ-ਰੋਅ ਨੇ ਖੁਲਾਸਾ ਕੀਤਾ ਹੈ ਕਿ ਉਹ ਸਟੇਜ 4 ਫੇਫੜਿਆਂ ਦੇ ਕੈਂਸਰ (ਐਕਸੋਨ 20 ਨਾਨ-ਸਮਾਲ ਸੈੱਲ) ਨਾਲ ਜੂਝ ਰਹੀ ਹੈ। 38 ਸਾਲਾ ਸੂਜ਼ੀ ਨੂੰ ਜੋ ਕੈਂਸਰ ਹੋਇਆ ਹੈ ਉਹ ਰੀੜ੍ਹ ਦੀ ਹੱਡੀ ਅਤੇ ਲਿੰਫ ਨੋਡਸ ਤੱਕ ਫੈਲ ਗਿਆ ਹੈ।

newsArray.title: ರನೌಟ್‌, ಕ್ಯಾಚ್‌ ಔಟ್‌ ಅಷ್ಟೇ ಅಲ್ಲ... ಕ್ರಿಕೆಟ್‌ನಲ್ಲಿದೆ ಒಟ್ಟು 11 ರೀತಿಯ ಔಟ್‌ಗಳು! ಯಾವ್ಯಾವು ಗೊತ್ತೇ?
keywords: how many types of cricket outs are there
what are the 10 types of batsman out
what are the 5 ways to out in cricket
creator: Zee News Hindi
Zee News Kannada
newsArray.description: types of out in cricket: ಕ್ರಿಕೆಟ್‌ನಲ್ಲಿ ಒಬ್ಬ ಬ್ಯಾಟ್ಸ್‌ಮನ್ ಅನ್ನು 11 ವಿಧಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ಔಟ್ ಮಾಡಬಹುದು ಎಂದರೆ ನಿಮಗೆ ನಂಬಲು ಸಾಧ್ಯವೇ? ಕ್ರಿಕೆಟ್‌ನಲ್ಲಿನ ನಿಯಮಗಳನ್ನು ಮೇರಿಲ್‌ಬೋನ್ ಕ್ರಿಕೆಟ್ ಕ್ಲಬ್ (MCC) ನಿಗದಿಪಡಿಸುತ್ತದೆ ಮತ್ತು ICC ಜಾರಿಗೊಳಿಸುತ್ತದೆ.

newsArray.title: Test Twenty highlights ever-evolving business of spotting cricketing talent
creator: seamus.obuachalla
newsArray.description: article author: Jon PikeThu, 2025-10-23 17:06As a boy, I dreamed of playing cricket for my county and my country. Obviously, I was not the only one. Very few made it to the top. The financial rewards at the time were slim but the status counted for something. The pathways to the top were random.A scout would come to matches to watch players. Over time, he formed a view and reported to the county coaches. An invitation to a trial might be issued, a single chance to impress. Failure was unlikely to gain a second chance. Even success did not guarantee a second invitation. Main category: SportCricketTags: Jon Pike Cricket Column

newsArray.title: Test Twenty highlights ever-evolving business of spotting cricketing talent
creator: seamus.obuachalla
newsArray.description: article author: Jon PikeThu, 2025-10-23 17:06As a boy, I dreamed of playing cricket for my county and my country. Obviously, I was not the only one. Very few made it to the top. The financial rewards at the time were slim but the status counted for something. The pathways to the top were random.A scout would come to matches to watch players. Over time, he formed a view and reported to the county coaches. An invitation to a trial might be issued, a single chance to impress. Failure was unlikely to gain a second chance. Even success did not guarantee a second invitation. Main category: SportCricketTags: Jon Pike Cricket Column
